00054 /* Changelog flags */
00056 #define CLM_ON    0x00001
00057 
00058 #define CLM_ERR   0x00002
00059 /* Marker flags */
00061 #define CLM_START 0x10000
00062 
00063 #define CLM_FINI  0x20000
00064 
00065 #define CLM_PURGE 0x40000
00066 
00067 struct mdd_changelog {
00068         spinlock_t              mc_lock;        /* for index */
00069         int                     mc_flags;
00070         int                     mc_mask;
00071         __u64                   mc_index;
00072         __u64                   mc_starttime;
00073         spinlock_t              mc_user_lock;
00074         int                     mc_lastuser;
00075 };
00076 
00077 static inline __u64 cl_time(void) {
00078         cfs_fs_time_t time;
00079 
00080         cfs_fs_time_current(&time);
00081         return (((__u64)time.tv_sec) << 30) + time.tv_nsec;
00082 }

00098 struct mdd_device {
00099         struct md_device                 mdd_md_dev;
00100         struct obd_export               *mdd_child_exp;

00104         struct lu_fid                    mdd_local_root_fid;
00105         struct dt_device_param           mdd_dt_conf;
00106         struct dt_object                *mdd_orphans; /* PENDING directory */
00107         struct proc_dir_entry            *mdd_proc_entry;
00108         struct mdd_changelog             mdd_cl;
00109         unsigned long                    mdd_atime_diff;
00110         struct mdd_object               *mdd_dot_lustre;
00111         struct mdd_dot_lustre_objs       mdd_dot_lustre_objs;
00112         unsigned int                     mdd_sync_permission;
00113         int                              mdd_connects;
00114         struct local_oid_storage        *mdd_los;
00115         struct mdd_generic_thread        mdd_orph_cleanup_thread;
00116 };

00118 enum mod_flags {
00119         /* The dir object has been unlinked */
00120         DEAD_OBJ   = 1 << 0,
00121         ORPHAN_OBJ = 1 << 1,
00122 };

00125         struct md_object   mod_obj;
00126         /* open count */

00128         __u32             mod_valid;
00129         __u64             mod_cltime;

00131 };

00133 struct mdd_thread_info {
00134         struct lu_fid             mti_fid;
00135         struct lu_fid             mti_fid2; /* used for be & cpu converting */
00139         struct lu_attr            mti_pattr;
00140         struct lu_attr            mti_cattr;
00141         struct lu_attr            mti_tpattr;
00142         struct lu_attr            mti_tattr;
00144         struct lu_attr            mti_la_for_fix;
00145         /* Only used in mdd_object_start */
00146         struct lu_attr            mti_la_for_start;
00147         /* mti_ent and mti_key must be conjoint,
00148         * then mti_ent::lde_name will be mti_key. */
00149         struct lu_dirent          mti_ent;
00150         char                      mti_key[NAME_MAX + 16];
00151         struct lu_buf             mti_buf[4];
00152         struct lu_buf             mti_big_buf; /* biggish persistent buf */
00153         struct lu_buf             mti_link_buf; /* buf for link ea */
00154         struct obdo               mti_oa;
00155         char                      mti_xattr_buf[LUSTRE_POSIX_ACL_MAX_SIZE];
00156         struct dt_allocation_hint mti_hint;
00157         struct dt_object_format   mti_dof;
00158         struct linkea_data        mti_link_data;
00159         struct md_op_spec         mti_spec;
00160         struct dt_insert_rec      mti_dt_rec;
00161         struct lfsck_request      mti_lr;
00162         struct lu_seq_range       mti_range;
00163 };

00365 /* inline functions */
00366 static inline int lu_device_is_mdd(struct lu_device *d)
00367 {
00368         return ergo(d != NULL && d->ld_ops != NULL, d->ld_ops == &mdd_lu_ops);
00369 }
00370 
00371 static inline struct mdd_device* lu2mdd_dev(struct lu_device *d)
00372 {
00373         LASSERT(lu_device_is_mdd(d));
00374         return container_of0(d, struct mdd_device, mdd_md_dev.md_lu_dev);
00375 }
00376 
00377 static inline struct lu_device *mdd2lu_dev(struct mdd_device *d)
00378 {
00379         return (&d->mdd_md_dev.md_lu_dev);
00380 }
00381 
00382 static inline struct mdd_object *lu2mdd_obj(struct lu_object *o)
00383 {
00384         LASSERT(ergo(o != NULL, lu_device_is_mdd(o->lo_dev)));
00385         return container_of0(o, struct mdd_object, mod_obj.mo_lu);
00386 }
00387 
00388 static inline struct mdd_device* mdo2mdd(struct md_object *mdo)
00389 {
00390         return lu2mdd_dev(mdo->mo_lu.lo_dev);
00391 }
00392 
00393 static inline struct mdd_object* md2mdd_obj(struct md_object *mdo)
00394 {
00395         return container_of0(mdo, struct mdd_object, mod_obj);
00396 }
00397 
00398 static inline const struct dt_device_operations *
00399 mdd_child_ops(struct mdd_device *d)
00400 {
00401         return d->mdd_child->dd_ops;
00402 }
00403 
00404 static inline struct lu_object *mdd2lu_obj(struct mdd_object *obj)
00405 {
00406         return &obj->mod_obj.mo_lu;
00407 }
00408 
00409 static inline struct dt_object* mdd_object_child(struct mdd_object *o)
00410 {
00411         return container_of0(lu_object_next(mdd2lu_obj(o)),
00412                              struct dt_object, do_lu);
00413 }
00414 
00415 static inline struct obd_device *mdd2obd_dev(struct mdd_device *mdd)
00416 {
00417         return (mdd->mdd_md_dev.md_lu_dev.ld_obd);
00418 }
00419 
00420 static inline struct mdd_device *mdd_obj2mdd_dev(struct mdd_object *obj)
00421 {
00422         return mdo2mdd(&obj->mod_obj);
00423 }
00424 
00425 static inline const struct lu_fid *mdo2fid(const struct mdd_object *obj)
00426 {
00427         return lu_object_fid(&obj->mod_obj.mo_lu);
00428 }
00429 
00430 static inline umode_t mdd_object_type(const struct mdd_object *obj)
00431 {
00432         return lu_object_attr(&obj->mod_obj.mo_lu);
00433 }
00434 
00435 static inline int mdd_is_dead_obj(struct mdd_object *obj)
00436 {
00437         return obj && obj->mod_flags & DEAD_OBJ;
00438 }
00439

00441 {
00442         return lu_object_exists(mdd2lu_obj(obj));
00443 }

00446 {
00447         return lu_object_remote(mdd2lu_obj(obj));
00448 }

00450 static inline const struct lu_fid *mdd_object_fid(struct mdd_object *obj)
00451 {
00452         return lu_object_fid(mdd2lu_obj(obj));
00453 }

00468                                           struct mdd_object *obj,
00469                                           const struct lu_attr *la, int mask)
00470 {
00471         return __mdd_permission_internal(env, obj, la, mask, -1);
00472 }
00473 
00474 static inline int mdd_permission_internal_locked(const struct lu_env *env,
00475                                                 struct mdd_object *obj,
00476                                                 const struct lu_attr *la,
00477                                                 int mask,
00478                                                 enum mdd_object_role role)
00479 {
00480         return __mdd_permission_internal(env, obj, la, mask, role);
00481 }

00483 /* mdd inline func for calling osd_dt_object ops */
00484 static inline int mdo_attr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00485                                struct lu_attr *la)
00486 {
00487         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00488         return dt_attr_get(env, next, la);
00489 }
00490 
00491 static inline int mdo_declare_attr_set(const struct lu_env *env,
00492                                        struct mdd_object *obj,
00493                                        const struct lu_attr *la,
00494                                        struct thandle *handle)
00495 {
00496         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00497         return dt_declare_attr_set(env, next, la, handle);
00498 }
00499 
00500 static inline int mdo_attr_set(const struct lu_env *env,
00501                                struct mdd_object *obj,
00502                                const struct lu_attr *la,
00503                                struct thandle *handle)
00504 {
00505         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00506 
00507         if (!mdd_object_exists(obj))
00508                 return -ENOENT;
00509 
00510         return dt_attr_set(env, next, la, handle);
00511 }
00512 
00513 static inline int mdo_xattr_get(const struct lu_env *env,struct mdd_object *obj,
00514                                 struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name)
00515 {
00516         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00517         return dt_xattr_get(env, next, buf, name);
00518 }
00519 
00520 static inline int mdo_declare_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env,
00521                                         struct mdd_object *obj,
00522                                         const struct lu_buf *buf,
00523                                         const char *name,
00524                                         int fl, struct thandle *handle)
00525 {
00526         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00527         return dt_declare_xattr_set(env, next, buf, name, fl, handle);
00528 }
00529 
00530 static inline int mdo_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env,struct mdd_object *obj,
00531                                 const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name,
00532                                 int fl, struct thandle *handle)
00533 {
00534         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00535 
00536         if (!mdd_object_exists(obj))
00537                 return -ENOENT;
00538 
00539         return dt_xattr_set(env, next, buf, name, fl, handle);
00540 }
00541 
00542 static inline int mdo_declare_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env,
00543                                         struct mdd_object *obj,
00544                                         const char *name,
00545                                         struct thandle *handle)
00546 {
00547         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00548         return dt_declare_xattr_del(env, next, name, handle);
00549 }
00550 
00551 static inline int mdo_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env,struct mdd_object *obj,
00552                                 const char *name, struct thandle *handle)
00553 {
00554         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00555 
00556         if (!mdd_object_exists(obj))
00557                 return -ENOENT;
00558 
00559         return dt_xattr_del(env, next, name, handle);
00560 }
00561 
00562 static inline int
00563 mdo_xattr_list(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00564                struct lu_buf *buf)
00565 {
00566         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00567 
00568         if (!mdd_object_exists(obj))
00569                 return -ENOENT;
00570 
00571         return dt_xattr_list(env, next, buf);
00572 }
00573 
00574 static inline
00575 int mdo_declare_index_insert(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00576                              const struct lu_fid *fid, __u32 type,
00577                              const char *name, struct thandle *handle)
00578 {
00579         struct dt_object *next  = mdd_object_child(obj);
00580         int               rc;
00581 
00582         /*
00583          * if the object doesn't exist yet, then it's supposed to be created
00584          * and declaration of the creation should be enough to insert ./..
00585          */
00586 
00587         rc = -ENOTDIR;
00588         if (dt_try_as_dir(env, next)) {
00589                 struct dt_insert_rec *rec = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_dt_rec;
00590 
00591                 rec->rec_fid = fid;
00592                 rec->rec_type = type;
00593                 rc = dt_declare_insert(env, next, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00594                                        (const struct dt_key *)name, handle);
00595         }
00596 
00597          return rc;
00598 }
00599 
00600 static inline
00601 int mdo_declare_index_delete(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00602                              const char *name, struct thandle *handle)
00603 {
00604         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00605 
00606         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, next))
00607                 return -ENOTDIR;
00608 
00609         return dt_declare_delete(env, next, (const struct dt_key *)name,
00610                                  handle);
00611 }
